page.title: 07Competitions at the Fair.
page.content:
For the tug of war there were six men on each end of a long rope.They were very strong.They had to dig their heels in the grass to stop being pulled over the line and they heaved and strained and pulled on the rope.They were all farmers' sons.
The game of skittles is played on a long board . Nine skittles are placed on the end of the board and you bowl a ball towards them.If you hit some down,say six or nine,you get six or nine points.
To test your strength you had to pay 20p for a big hammer. Then you had to bang a little peg with the hammer which made a metal cup-shape shoot up a pole and hit the bell.
